org.grouplens.grapht.reflect.internal

Class ReflectionDesire

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.grapht.reflect.internal.ReflectionDesire
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Desire

    public class ReflectionDesire
extends Object
implements Desire, Serializable
    ReflectionDesire is an implementation of desire that contains all necessary implementation to represent a desire, except that the point of injection is abstracted by an InjectionPoint.
    Author:
    GroupLens Research
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReflectionDesire

        public ReflectionDesire(InjectionPoint injectPoint)
        Create a ReflectionDesire that immediately wraps the given InjectionPoint. The desired type equals the type declared by the injection point. The created desire will have a satisfaction if the injection point's type is satisfiable.
        Parameters:
        injectPoint - The injection point to wrap
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if injectPoint is null

      • ReflectionDesire

        public ReflectionDesire(Class<?> desiredType,
                        InjectionPoint injectPoint,
                        Satisfaction satisfaction)
        Create a ReflectionDesire that represents the dependency for desiredType that will be injected into the given InjectionPoint. The optional satisfaction will satisfy this desire. If null is provided, and the desired type instantiable, a ClassSatisfaction is created.
        Parameters:
        desiredType - The desired type of the dependency
        injectPoint - The injection point of the desire
        satisfaction - The satisfaction satisfying this desire, if there is one
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if desiredType, injectPoint, or dfltSource is null
        IllegalArgumentException - if desiredType is not assignable to the type of the injection point, or if the satisfaction's type is not assignable to the desired type

    • Method Detail

      • getDesires

        public static List<Desire> getDesires(Class<?> type)
        Return a list of desires that must satisfied in order to instantiate the given type.
        Parameters:
        type - The class type whose dependencies will be queried
        Returns:
        The dependency desires for the given type
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the type is null

      • getDesiredType

        public Class<?> getDesiredType()
        Specified by:
        getDesiredType in interface Desire
        Returns:
        The desired type, potentially more constrained than the injection point's type

      • getInjectionPoint

        public InjectionPoint getInjectionPoint()
        Specified by:
        getInjectionPoint in interface Desire
        Returns:
        The injection point of this desire

      • isInstantiable

        public boolean isInstantiable()
        Description copied from interface: Desire
        Query whether this desire is instantiable, that is, resolved to a concrete type. If it is instantiable, then it can be converted to a Satisfaction with Desire.getSatisfaction().
        Specified by:
        isInstantiable in interface Desire
        Returns:
        true if the desire is for a concrete class. The only further desires or satisfactions that can satisfy it are for subclasses of the desire type.

      • getSatisfaction

        public Satisfaction getSatisfaction()
        Description copied from interface: Desire
        Get the satisfaction (concrete type) if this desire is fully resolved.
        Specified by:
        getSatisfaction in interface Desire
        Returns:
        The satisfaction for this desire, or null if the desire is not a concrete type.

      • restrict

        public Desire restrict(Class<?> type)
        Description copied from interface: Desire
        Return a new Desire that restricts the type of this desire to the given class. The type must be a subclass of the desired type.
        Specified by:
        restrict in interface Desire
        Parameters:
        type - The restricted type
        Returns:
        A restricted Desire

      • restrict

        public Desire restrict(Satisfaction satis)
        Description copied from interface: Desire
        Return a new Desire that restricts the type of this desire to the erased type of the satisfaction. The returned Desire will also be instantiable and return the provided satisfaction from Desire.getSatisfaction().
        Specified by:
        restrict in interface Desire
        Parameters:
        satis - The satisfaction to restrict this desire to
        Returns:
        A restricted and satisfied desire
